item.description:
It's time to go see my favorite Cello playing Chicks.... the Cello Chix playing at the Alchemist.

Come on out and check out the Cello Chix saw thru and tear up some classic rock tuneage.

It been awhile since we've had a meetup with these ladies and if you haven't seen and listened to them play some classic rock hits on electrified cellos, your missing out ;-).

I'm stilll blown away by Becca's rendition of Purple haze...

Listen to them ( Myspace) play classics from The Beatles, Led Zepplin, The Doors, Jethro Tull and other great artists.

No cover charge..
Hope to meetup with you there..
item.name: Cello Chix @ the Alchemist
